mapper.insert:
insert into vaccine_station_rel
id,
vaccine_id,
vaccine_station_id,
next_vaccine_id,
vaccine_name,
minium_age,
last_time_interval,
create_time,
create_by,
update_time,
will_vaccine_name,
bak_2,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineStationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{nextVaccineId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{vaccineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{miniumAge,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{lastTimeInterval,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{willVaccineName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.select: SELECT vsr.next_vaccine_id nextVaccineId,vbi.birthday,vi.last_time_vaccine lastTimeVaccine,vi.last_time_vaccine lastTimeVaccine, vs.work_date workDate,vs.name vaccineStationName,vi.minium_age miniumAge,vsr.will_vaccine_name willVaccineName from vaccine_station_rel vsr INNER JOIN vaccine_baby_info vbi on vsr.vaccine_station_id = vbi.vaccine_station_id INNER JOIN vaccine_info vi on vi.id = vsr.vaccine_id INNER JOIN vaccine_station vs on vs.id = vsr.vaccine_station_id where vi.QR_code = #{QRCode} and vbi.sys_user_id = #{openId} GROUP BY vbi.sys_user_id
